sn21.7:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
sn21.7:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma visakho pancalaputto upatthanasalayam bhikkhu dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti, poriya vacaya vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya pariyapannaya anissitaya.
sn21.7:2.1: Atha kho bhagava sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yena upatthanasala tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
sn21.7:2.3: “ko nu kho, bhikkhave, upatthanasalayam bhikkhu dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti poriya vacaya vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya pariyapannaya anissitaya”ti?
sn21.7:2.4: “Ayasma, bhante, visakho pancalaputto upatthanasalayam bhikkhu dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti, poriya vacaya vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya pariyapannaya anissitaya”ti.
sn21.7:3.1: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam visakham pancalaputtam amantesi:
sn21.7:3.3: sadhu kho tvam, visakha, bhikkhu dhammiya kathaya sandassesi …pe… atthassa vinnapaniya pariyapannaya anissitaya”ti.
sn21.7:4.2: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
